occupation: President & CEO at Axiom Exploration Group
headline: President & CEO @ Axiom Exploration Group
summary:
Experienced Professional Geologist and manager with over 12 years of geological supervision, resource exploration and business management experience in both junior and major international exploration and mining sectors.

Active Volunteer Firefighter and First Responder with Warman Fire Department.

experiences.title: Fire Fighter & First Responder
experiences.description: Volunteer fire fighter and first responder.
